resources.string: Toshinori Yagi (八や木ぎ俊とし典のり Yagi Toshinori?), more commonly known by his hero name, All Might (オールマイト Ōru Maito?), is the tritagonist of My Hero Academia, and the arc protagonist of the Hideout Raid Arc. All Might is the former No. 1 Pro Hero who bore the title of the world\'s Symbol of Peace (平和の象徴 Heiwa no Shōchō?). He teaches Foundational Hero Studies at U.A. High School.All Might was the eighth holder of the One For All Quirk after receiving it from Nana Shimura. He has since passed the torch to Izuku Midoriya, whom he is training to be his successor. After using up all the embers of One For All to defeat All For One, All Might retired and ended his era as the world\'s greatest hero.
A Full Mark! That\'s Impressive! What An Amazing work, good job!
You did Alright, but I expect more from my successor, you can try again anytime!
You failed the exam, but no worries! you could always try again! go beyond, Plus Ultra!

Hi, i am Mohammed, the creator of this app. I am a beginner programmer learning android development. i made this app to improve my coding skills and not out of weebary for all might :). (though i am still a weeb). if you liked my app and have suggestions for it let me know.
